verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to Aaron <WH175> and to his sons, <WH1121> that they separate <WH5144> themselves from the holy <WH6944> things of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and that they profane <WH2490> not my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034> in those things which <WH834> they hallow <WH6942> to me: I am the LORD. <WH3068>

Say <WH559> to them, Whoever <WH376> <WH834> he be of all <WH3605> your seed <WH2233> among your generations, <WH1755> that goes <WH7126> to the holy <WH6944> things, which <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> hallow <WH6942> to the LORD, <WH3068> having his uncleanness <WH2932> on him, that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off from my presence: <WH6440> I am the LORD. <WH3068>

What <WH376> man <WH376> soever of the seed <WH2233> of Aaron <WH175> is a leper, <WH6879> or <WH176> has a running <WH2100> issue; <WH2100> he shall not eat <WH398> of the holy <WH6944> things, until <WH5704> he be clean. <WH2891> And whoever touches <WH5060> any <WH3605> thing that is unclean <WH2931> by the dead, <WH5315> or <WH176> a man <WH376> whose <WH834> seed <WH7902> <WH2233> goes <WH3318> from him;

Or <WH176> whoever <WH376> <WH834> touches <WH5060> any <WH3605> creeping <WH8318> thing, whereby <WH834> he may be made unclean, <WH2930> or <WH176> a man <WH120> of whom <WH834> he may take uncleanness, <WH2930> whatever <WH3605> uncleanness <WH2932> he has;

The soul <WH5315> which <WH834> has touched <WH5060> any such shall be unclean <WH2930> until <WH5704> even, <WH6153> and shall not eat <WH398> of the holy <WH6944> things, unless <WH3588> <WH518> he wash <WH7364> his flesh <WH1320> with water. <WH4325>
And when the sun <WH8121> is down, <WH935> he shall be clean, <WH2891> and shall afterward <WH310> eat <WH398> of the holy <WH6944> things; because <WH3588> it is his food. <WH3899>
That which dies <WH5038> of itself, or is torn <WH2966> with beasts, <WH2966> he shall not eat <WH398> to defile <WH2930> himself therewith; I am the LORD. <WH3068>

They shall therefore keep <WH8104> my ordinance, <WH4931> lest <WH3808> they bear <WH5375> sin <WH2399> for it, and die <WH4191> therefore, if <WH3588> they profane <WH2490> it: I the LORD <WH3068> do sanctify <WH6942> them.

There shall no <WH3808> stranger <WH2114> eat <WH398> of the holy <WH6944> thing: a sojourner <WH8453> of the priest, <WH3548> or an hired <WH7916> servant, <WH7916> shall not eat <WH398> of the holy <WH6944> thing.

But if <WH3588> the priest <WH3548> buy <WH7069> any soul <WH5315> with his money, <WH3701> he shall eat <WH398> of it, and he that is born <WH3211> in his house: <WH1004> they shall eat <WH398> of his meat. <WH3899>
If <WH3588> the priest's <WH3548> daughter <WH1323> also be married to a stranger, <WH376> <WH2114> she may not eat <WH398> of an offering <WH8641> of the holy <WH6944> things.

But if <WH3588> the priest's <WH3548> daughter <WH1323> be a widow, <WH490> or divorced, <WH1644> and have no <WH369> child, <WH2233> and is returned <WH7725> to her father's <WH1> house, <WH1004> as in her youth, <WH5271> she shall eat <WH398> of her father's <WH1> meat: <WH3899> but there shall be no <WH3808> stranger <WH2114> eat <WH398> thereof.

And if <WH3588> a man <WH376> eat <WH398> of the holy <WH6944> thing unwittingly, <WH7684> then he shall put <WH3254> the fifth <WH2549> part thereof to it, and shall give <WH5414> it to the priest <WH3548> with the holy <WH6944> thing.
And they shall not profane <WH2490> the holy <WH6944> things of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> they offer <WH7311> to the LORD; <WH3068>
Or suffer <WH5375> them to bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of trespass, <WH819> when they eat <WH398> their holy <WH6944> things: for I the LORD <WH3068> do sanctify <WH6942> them.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Speak <WH1696> to Aaron, <WH175> and to his sons, <WH1121> and to all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> to them, Whatever <WH376> <WH834> he be of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> or of the strangers <WH1616> in Israel, <WH3478> that will offer <WH7126> his oblation <WH7133> for all <WH3605> his vows, <WH5088> and for all <WH3605> his freewill <WH5071> offerings, which <WH834> they will offer <WH7126> to the LORD <WH3068> for a burnt <WH5930> offering;
You shall offer at your own will <WH7522> a male <WH2145> without <WH8549> blemish, <WH8549> of the beeves, <WH1241> of the sheep, <WH3775> or of the goats. <WH5795>
But whatever <WH3605> has a blemish, <WH3971> that shall you not offer: <WH7126> for it shall not be acceptable <WH7522> for you.

And whoever <WH376> <WH834> offers <WH7126> a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace <WH8002> offerings to the LORD <WH3068> to accomplish <WH6381> his vow, <WH5088> or <WH176> a freewill <WH5071> offering in beeves <WH1241> or sheep, <WH6629> it shall be perfect <WH8549> to be accepted; <WH7522> there shall be no <WH3808> blemish <WH3971> therein.

Blind, <WH5788> or <WH176> broken, <WH7665> or <WH176> maimed, <WH2782> or <WH176> having a running sore, <WH2990> or <WH176> scurvy, <WH1618> or <WH176> scabbed, <WH3217> you shall not offer <WH7126> these <WH428> to the LORD, <WH3068> nor <WH3808> make <WH5414> an offering by fire of them on the altar <WH4196> to the LORD. <WH3068>

Either a bullock <WH7794> or a lamb <WH7716> that has any thing superfluous <WH8311> or lacking <WH7038> in his parts, that may you offer <WH6213> for a freewill <WH5071> offering; but for a vow <WH5088> it shall not be accepted. <WH7521>

You shall not offer <WH7126> to the LORD <WH3068> that which is bruised, <WH4600> or crushed, <WH3807> or broken, <WH5423> or cut; <WH3772> neither <WH3808> shall you make <WH6213> any offering thereof in your land. <WH776>

Neither <WH3808> from a stranger's <WH1121> <WH5236> hand <WH3027> shall you offer <WH7126> the bread <WH3899> of your God <WH430> of any <WH3605> of these; <WH428> because <WH3588> their corruption <WH4893> is in them, and blemishes <WH3971> be in them: they shall not be accepted <WH7521> for you.
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

When a bullock, <WH7794> or <WH176> a sheep, <WH3775> or <WH176> a goat, <WH5795> is brought <WH3205> forth, <WH3205> then it shall be seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> under <WH8478> the dam; <WH517> and from the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> and thereafter <WH1973> it shall be accepted <WH7521> for an offering made by fire to the LORD. <WH3068>
And whether it be cow, <WH7794> or <WH176> ewe, <WH7716> you shall not kill <WH7819> it and her young <WH1121> both in one <WH259> day. <WH3117>
And when <WH3588> you will offer <WH2076> a sacrifice <WH2077> of thanksgiving <WH8426> to the LORD, <WH3068> offer <WH2076> it at your own will. <WH7522>
On the same <WH1931> day <WH3117> it shall be eaten <WH398> up; you shall leave <WH3498> none <WH3808> of it until <WH5704> the morrow: <WH1242> I am the LORD. <WH3068>
Therefore shall you keep <WH8104> my commandments, <WH4687> and do <WH6213> them: I am the LORD. <WH3068>

Neither <WH3808> shall you profane <WH2490> my holy <WH6944> name; <WH8034> but I will be hallowed <WH6942> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> I am the LORD <WH3068> which hallow <WH6942> you,
That brought <WH3318> you out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> to be your God: <WH430> I am the LORD. <WH3068>
